title: Apple patches Log4Shell iCloud vulnerability that set internet ‘on fire’
content: Late last week, cybersecurity firm LunaSec uncovered a critical vulnerability in the open-source Log4j library that could give hackers the ability to run malicious code on remote servers. Countless apps and services were said to be vulnerable by the exploit, known as Log4Shell, including iCloud, Minecraft, and countless others. According to the Eclectic Light Company, […]
